Curriculum Vitae
	          KPM Mounika



                                                                                     KPM Mounika
	Objective


To work in a pragmatic way, where I can show my talent and enhance my skills to meet the required goals and    objectives of the organization with full integrity and zest.

	Work Summary


A technocrat with 3 years and 6 months of experience in Advanced Analytics, Model Building, Predictive Analysis and data visualization.Presently working with HCL Technologies, as a Data Analyst. An energetic, self-motivated team member with excellent communication and presentation skills always ready for new technologies and challenges.

	Statistical and Analytical Skills


· Have clear understanding of machine learning concepts.
· Worked on Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Decision Tree, Random forest,KNN and SVM algorithms using Python.
· Worked on unsupervised learning algorithms using K-means clustering, hierarchical clustering and DB Scan.
· Worked on Dimensionality reductions techniques like PCA.
· Worked on NLP using nltk package.
· Data visualization using seaborn in Python.
· Feature engineering in Python. Missing value and outlier handling, Transforming variable, Creating new variables, Reshaping data using packages like pandas,numpy for regression and classification models.
 
	Technical Skills


Programming Languages : Python,SQL
Tools Used                          : Anaconda, Jupyter Notebook
Hardware Platforms         : Data Science Virtual Machine, Windows Server 2012 R2.

	Professional Experience


Project- Deutsche Bank Advanced Analytics
Client : Deutsche Bank
Tools : Anaconda,Jupyter , SQL
Team Size : 3
Organization : HCL Technologies


Roles and Responsibilities
· Understanding the business problems.
· Analyze large datasets and Data Cleaning.
· Calculated the optimum interest rate for the bank customers applying for loan.
· Performed regression to suggest the amount of loan to be given the customers depending on their previous behaviour.
· Performed classification for HR attrition to estimate the people that will be leaving the company.
· Performed regression to estimate the credit card limit.
· Building the models on the datasets and testing the performance of the models using Cross Validation.
· Communicate the results of analyses, modeling, and tests through data visualization.

Project- CareOregon Data Analytics
Client : CareOregon
Tools : Anaconda,Jupyter,SQL
Team Size : 3
Organization: HCL Technologies
Roles and Responsibilities
· Understanding the business problems.
· Analyze large datasets and Data Cleaning.
· Worked on the Insurance plan clustering according to the customers.
· Worked on the clustering problem on which kind of customers to be targeted for contacting regarding the insurance plan.
· Worked on Customer Churn  to analyse which customers will cancel their contracts in near furture.
· Communicate the results of analyses, modeling, and tests through data visualization.
